org.crosswire.bibledesktop.desktop
类 StatusBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.crosswire.bibledesktop.desktop.StatusBar
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, URIEventListener
public class StatusBar
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, URIEventListener

The status bar provides useful info to the user as to the current state of the program.

We need to think about the stuff to put in here:

  • A status message. This changes with what the user is pointing at, so is very similar to tool-tips. Although they are commonly more instructional.
  • A set of panels that tell you the time/if CAPS is presses and so on

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
